text:
e="preserve">Frederick Davies (22 August 1939 – 2 September 2020) was an English footballer. He made nearly 400 appearances in the Football League playing as a goalkeeper for Wolverhampton Wanderers, Cardiff City and AFC Bournemouth.
He later became a manager, taking charge of Shrewsbury Town and Weymouth. He was born in Liverpool.
Davies died on 2 September 2020 from idiopathic pulmonary fibrosis, aged 81.
